    Clean GWAS summary statistics and adds metadata

    run_gwas_cleaner.Rd

    Cleans GWAS summary statistics and adds metadata

    run_gwas_cleaner(sumstats_file, cols.to.keep, bigSNP, LD_Blocks)

    Arguments

    sumstats_file

    file containing raw summary statistics. Coordinates should be hg39/b37; the pipeline does not support hg38.

    cols.to.keep

    character vector of the following columns: chr, position, allele1, allele2, beta, se, unique id, pvalue

    bigSNP

    bigSNP object from bigsnpr.

    LD_Blocks

    Reference LD blocks

    Value

    Cleaned summary statistics + LD block of every SNP, as well as its index in the reference panel of genotypes

    Contents

    Developed by Kaixuan Luo, Alan Selewa, Sebastian Pott, Xin He.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.
